video_prompt: A couple entwines, their ornate robes flowing as they gently shift amidst wisps of clouds, expressions softly altering as their gaze drifts. Headpieces and jewelry subtly gleam as light plays across their changing poses within a celestial backdrop.
image_prompt: Generate a vertical image of an elegant Asian couple in traditional, ornate white and gold robes, in a serene, heavenly setting with soft blue sky and wispy clouds. The male, taller and wearing a golden crown, has his arm around the female, who wears elaborate hairpins and earrings. Both gaze calmly at the viewer, evoking a sense of ethereal beauty and closeness. Soft, even lighting highlights their features and shimmering attire.
refined_video_prompt: A couple's entwined forms subtly shift and re-align, their ornate robes billowing and undulating with each movement. Wisps of clouds gently drift and swirl around them. Their expressions softly alter, gazes slowly drifting and locking. Light dynamically plays across their changing poses, causing headpieces and jewelry to intermittently gleam and shimmer. The celestial backdrop softly pulsates and evolves.
